Set.Text: The Coffee House is a Renaissance-era building unique to Austria, replacing the Windmill. It increases the city's [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and speed at which [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People are generated by 25%. Instead of providing additonal [ICON_FOOD] Food from [ICON_RES_WHEAT] Wheat, it provides additonal [ICON_FOOD] Food from [ICON_RES_COFFEE] Coffee and [ICON_RES_TEA] Tea.
+25% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People generation in this City. +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food from [ICON_RES_COFFEE] Coffee and [ICON_RES_TEA] Tea.
